channel.title: Find Any String ID [Galkons]
channel.description:
I tested this on Galkons but it should be easy to convert to other clients.
Go into RSInterface.java and at the top where it says: [code]public final class RSInterface {[/code]
Under that add: [code] public static boolean showIds = true;[/code]
Next find: [code]rsInterface.message = stream.readString()[/code]
and below that line add: [code] if (showIds) rsInterface.message = Integer.toString(rsInterface.id);[/code]
What this does is lets you see the string IDs of every string on interfaces. If you want to turn this off, just change the showIds boolean to false.
Pic: [IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/ids.png[/img]
All credits to me. Enjoy. :)

@the_elve_age wrote:

You can do this for all interfaces/models/animations, but good find
